content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal beliefs or opinions. However, it is certainly notable that the current administration has emphasized the importance of education, particularly early childhood education and investing in the teaching profession. Education has long been recognized as a key driver of individual and societal success, and focusing on improving access and quality of education can have far-reaching positive impacts.

However, as you noted, it will be important for the administration to follow through on its promises and make substantive changes to improve the education system. This will involve navigating complex political negotiations, competing interests, and intractable challenges in the education sector, as well as sustaining investment and attention over the long term.

Ultimately, the success of educational policy will depend on a range of factors, including the needs and goals of educators and students, the availability of resources and support, and the broader political and social context in which policies are implemented. Nonetheless, taking steps towards improving education and investing in the teaching profession can help build a strong foundation for future success and equity.
